title: Topic 005 Question 069
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a policy-based virtual network gateway named GW1 and a virtual network named VNet1.
You need to ensure that you can configure a point-to-site connection from an on-premises computer to VNet1.
Which two actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Add a service endpoint to VNet1
Create a route-based virtual network gateway
Add a public IP address space to VNet1
